page.title: 03Gowerton Livestock Market.
page.content: The livestock market is held in Gowerton every Tuesday.A lot of the local farmers have to go to Carmarthen market because that is bigger but a lot still attend Gowerton Mart still. The main animals that are sold in the mart are calves,sheep,goats and some cows.They arrive at the market by 11.00am on Tuesday morning,if they are not sold the farmer has to take them away with him back to the farm. When we visited the mart we had the chance to talk to the auctioneer.He told us that he was the sixth person in his family to have been an auctioneer in Gowerton market.It was his Grandfather that had moved the market to its'present site in 1927 from the original 1917 site. The market is a busy place and one day every week it is the centre of all activity in the town of Gowerton.
